channel.title: Registering server on server status
channel.description:
not sure if this is the section but i seen help so
every time i try to register my server to server status i enter in everything
enter in my ip enter in the port
i know the port and the ip are correct because me and many of my friends can get into it from lots of diffrent computers
but everytime i try register it, it says im offline?
how do i get it to register properly?
